raw: U.S. shale company Whiting becomes first major bankruptcy of oil-price crash .

raw: ( Reuters ) - Whiting Petroleum Corp filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy , the U.S. shale producer said on Wednesday , the first publicly traded casualty of crashing crude oil prices that are expected to bite into record U.S. output .
replaced: ( the U.S. shale producer filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy , the U.S. shale producer said on Wednesday , the first publicly traded casualty of crashing crude oil prices that are expected to bite into record U.S. output .

raw: Numerous shale oil and gas producers , faced with burdensome debt loads , have cut spending aggressively as oil prices have plunged by about two - thirds this year with the coronavirus pandemic slamming fuel demand and Russia and Saudi Arabia flooding markets with extra crude .
